messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] my questions about divergent thinking
messages.msgSnippet: FYI to all, there s a fun book about divergent thinking as a gift,  by a couple of futurists: The Deviant s Advantage: How Fringe Ideas Create Mass Markets. I
messages.messageBody:
FYI to all, there's a fun book about divergent thinking as a gift, by
a couple of futurists: The Deviant's Advantage: How Fringe Ideas Create Mass
Markets. I think unschoolers might be just what they had in mind! <g> JJ

BonKnit@... writes:


> I know for myself I have always been a divergent thinker, I just did not
> know
> it had a name for far too many years. What once caused me no small amount of
>
> angst is now an advantageous gift.
> Laura
>
